attributes.action: Legislate the use of the Mosquito device
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Mosquito device has saved 100's thousands of pounds and transformed the lives of many blighted by Teen ASB. But there are no laws governing there use. They can be as big a problem as they set out to cure, please sign the petition asking for legislation to ensure if these devices are used that they are used properly and fairly. Thanks
